text: Nurallao (Nuràdda) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,270 people lived there. Its area is 34.76 km². It is 390 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Nurallao
